question:
####[UFAQ 23](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
If the Corp has a rezzed [Genetics Pavilion](/en/card/08113) when they score a Viral Weaponization, does the Runer draw 2 or 3 cards if [I've Had Worse](/en/card/07032) is trashed?
answer: The Runner will draw the full 3 cards. Viral Weaponization triggers at step 3.4 of the Corp's discard phase, which is still part of the Corp's turn.
